column5: A tip of the old OFC hat to the members of the Montreal chapter of Muskies Canada for their 15 year anniversary celebrated tomorrow (Saturday August 25th). The public is welcome  and particulars can be obtained on the MCI site.

Congrats to all the Montreal MCI boys, job well done.  As well a big thank you goes out to our KW chapter who is celebrating it's 25th.  MCI is going to be celebrating it's 30th anniversary in '08, looking forward to the celebration.  To bad I'm just back from vacation, it would of Been a good time to fish the Mtl summer event.
Certainly a good reason to celebrate  Congrats Montreal...many more for you.  We'll probably see you all at your outing again this year..  Cheers  Matt Clay
Yeah, you just missed it by a coupla days Richard. It's ok, I'm sure you'll be doing the Hawksbury one. Good luck out there.
Congratz fer shure anyone who heads over say ha BIG hey to Dennis for me and give him a big hug but dont pick him up.  What a great bunch from MTL
Did all the Mucksies in Canada get married on the same day???... by the Reverend Moon I suppose....
Shhhhhhhh it's an old ritual, it must be done same time of year or else.
